::: Inferno and Jackle, in beast mode, patroled the Predacon perimiter. For 
the moment they were in the wastelands. Rocks, Canyons, and deserts as far as 
he optic sensor and scan. :::

::: Inferno ::: Today is vert, very cold!

::: Jackle ::: I know, but we have to---did you hear that?

::: Inferno ::: Yes, its gunfire! Let me scan the area...

::: He scanned the area to see Quickstrike, Stingera, and two other bots 
exchanging crossfire. :::

::: Inferno ::: Aha! We will kill the invaders!

::: Jackle ::: Alright!

::: They transform and head to the small skirmish. :::
